title: Legendary Guardian Mastery
body: I'm just curious as to one aspect of the new resolve tree. The Armor/Magic Resist you gain from Legendary Guardian (tier 5). Does it count at bonus? I ask this because I want to know if it gets the extra synergy with Unyielding (tier 1). So if i take legendary guardian will unyielding increase the stats i get from it?

replies.body: Why is grasp of the undying OP on mundo early?
